title: Discovery
description: We start with a consultation to understand your vision, timeline, and specific shot list requirements.

title: The Shoot
description: Our team arrives early to scout the venue. We capture key moments using professional gear and backup systems.

title: Editing
description: We cull, color correct, and retouch your images. Video goes through assembly, music sync, and grading.

title: Delivery
description: Receive your private online gallery and download links within our guaranteed turnaround time.
